attributes.review: So I downloaded this app because I wanted to see what his plans for the future were. This only led to petitions and sign and text for him. Nothing was good for the people no likey
attributes.title: Not good disappointment

attributes.review: Let me tell you this app seems great at the beginning but once you close the app it deletes every app off your phone and the fbi shows up. 🤦‍♂️🤦‍♂️
attributes.title: Seemed fine

attributes.review:
This app is NOT kid friendly OR minority friendly OR lgbtq+ friendly OR Daca friendly OR women friendly OR peaceful protest friendly 
I’m sure you can see where this is going
attributes.title: 10/10 for worst app

attributes.review: Just a few hours after I had gotten it random middle aged men showed up at my house and tried to force me to support trump but then a flying brick hit them✨❤️🧚🏼‍♀️✨✨❤️🧚🏼‍♀️🧚🏼‍♀️❤️✨I really hope trump doesn’t get re-elected😘
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP DONT GET IT

attributes.review: This app took 6 hours to download and made my brand new phone slower than molasses. This app should just be removed.
attributes.title: I would give it a zero if I could

attributes.review: I was SEVERELY confused by this app. Also it asked for my phone number? And I don’t think that’s very appropriate since trump is married 😔. What a shame to promote such promiscuous behavior trump, very disappointed.
attributes.title: Don’t get this app

attributes.review: Never in my life have I had such a terrible; useless app!  First things first! Took all night to download, now what do I do with the stupid thing?
attributes.title: Horrible, terrible app! Do not download!

attributes.review: The app took 5 hours to download and it took up most of my storage. I got this app and then my phone started glitching a lot and malfunctioning. Then I got hacked so I give this app 1 out of 5.
attributes.title: Badd

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support our intelligent and lovely president as the patriotic citizen I am. I was pretty disappointed when I first opened the app and got spat on. Literally through the phone, it spit on my face. Will not be revisiting
attributes.title: APPLE NEEDS TO REMOVE THIS DISASTER

attributes.review: This is is sooo slow and took forever to download. All of the things on this app don’t make since make sense. Please don’t get this app it’s a waste of time and it’s very useless
attributes.title: Worst app ever
